TopicTitle: Whispers of the Kraken (Epilogue: Revelations of the Kraken)

Articles.Content:
OH SQUATCH

Anastasia Kerman is about to be silenced in the most final of ways ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif ";.;").

Heil Kraken!

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, CatastrophicFailure said:
> 
> 
> Great. So... what now? *Yes, I've been sent on a special mission to find you, in the midst of dark conspiracies and shadowy metaphysical strangeness, come with me if you want...* what, exactly?
> 

Actually, I think Val is about to find her inner Kyle Reese. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Assuming that the above quote *is* foreshadowing.

But Gene though. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")  That's hard to take. I know they're completely different stories and I'm in *no* way claiming any credit for this but I can't help seeing the happy bunch of rocketeers that Chadvey knew so well, as a mirror of my own <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>. Seeing that dream be brutally dismantled and then systematically eradicated, piece by piece is particularly tough for this reader.

> 
> 
> 9 hours ago, CatastrophicFailure said:
> 
> 
> She said something else, too, but Valentina didn't hear. She didn't hear anything in that moment. The entire world seemed to have dissolved away, as her vision narrowed down to a point, focused on the tiny, red dot of laser light dancing on Anna's forehead.
> 

Would be a shaaaaame, if that happened to be the laser aiming dot of a sniper rifle....
Val's got them reflexes, right? Make it a flesh wound rather than a fatal one.

> 
> 
> On August 12, 2016 at 4:43 AM, KSK said:
> 
> 
> Actually, I think Val is about to find her inner Kyle Reese. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Assuming that the above quote *is* foreshadowing.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> But Gene though. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")  That's hard to take. I know they're completely different stories and I'm in *no* way claiming any credit for this but I can't help seeing the happy bunch of rocketeers that Chadvey knew so well, as a mirror of my own <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)"><abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr></abbr>. Seeing that dream be brutally dismantled and then systematically eradicated, piece by piece is particularly tough for this reader.
> 

I can't deny a certain amount of influence, either, even if no mirroring was intended. I do wonder how many folks realized, that first time gathered around the bar table, that only Burdous would still be around by the end of *Shadows*. No one's fate was exactly a secret by that point, tho Gene never did get mentioned by name. 

But, as I always say, All Things Serve the Beam. Be steadfast, a storm is rising.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

Time for Val to stand, be true and remember the face of her father. 

And influencing somebody whose work I greatly admire - it doesn't get much better than that as a writer. Thanks.

Ok, I know who Mary Poppins is, and apparently cheetos are a breakfast cereal, but I'm going to have to \*blank stare\* your \*blank stare\*

On topic though, I don't think Anastasia can die just yet, she is Valentinas only lead. Killing Anastasia would effectively knock Valentina completely out of the game, she would have no other threads to follow.

Anastasia is wearing a Munstone necklace just like Vals, IIRC Val has recieved some form of protective ability from said necklace.
